summary: When I was 13 years old, I waited over a week for my Red Hat Linux ISO file to download.  I saw these nerds on TechTV talk about it, and I wanted to try it myself.  I told my parents what I was doing, and they told me that my older half-brother had mentioned it...
title: My Linux Saga
